subject: TopCoder Presents the TC Channel
body:
Hello sm1lies,

The first episode of the TC Channel, TopCoder's online video news magazine, is now online. The inaugural episode features news and educational information, as well as a recap of the TopCoder College Tour's visit to Belarus.

Watch it now: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=LinkTracking&link=/tc?module=Static%26d1=media%26d2=tcchannel%26clip=ep1&refer=email

Comments? Have a video clip you'd like to share? We want your feedback -- drop us an email at tcchannel@topcoder.com. 

Thanks for watching, and good luck in the Arena!

- The TopCoder Competitions Team


===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of TopCoder news & events. If you no longer wish to receive these emails, login to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'. In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails. Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.
